name: After Effects Output Module
summary: Learn about .AOM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: When video is rendered, you can apply multiple output modules in order to generate output video in multiple formats.

description: Video output settings file created by After Effects, a motion graphics and video effects application; saves video output options such as the file format, color profile, and compression; used for processing rendered video into a final output format; also enables output module settings to be reused.
